Expressly Designated Licensed Material

The following elements are owned by the Licensor and would otherwise consitute Reserved Material and are hereby designated as Licensed Material:

  • Design of the character sheets, including:
    • visual style
    • structural layout of elements on a page
    • layout and implementation of fields and calculations
    • ways in which the design adjusts to fit changes in character and environment
    • ways in which the design allows a user to interact with and edit the content within
  • The following parts of the source code:
    • The character sheets creation library (in the source code package "lib-charactersheets")
    • except for such parts that are embodiments of Open Game Content (designated in source code as OGL).

Login

Login with Patreon to get access to patron-only features.

Login with Patreon

Logging in will set a cookie on your PC. This does not contain any personally identifiable information, and will not be sent to any third party.

Become a patron

Patrons get the ability to edit all the fields, have calculations work automatically, and save character sheets. Login with Patreon to unlock these features:

Support the site and gain access to extra features for just $1 by becoming a patron.
